                                                   String path)
        Streams a file over FTP using the given client.
        Parameters:
        conn - an FtpConnector instance.
        path - the path to a file on the host.
        Returns:
        an Optional containing an InputStream to the file at path if it exists; otherwise, an empty Optional.

        Parameters:

        path - a path to a file on the host.

        Returns:

      • downloadAll

        public static Map<String,Boolean> downloadAll(FtpConnector conn,
                                              Map<String,OutputStream> targets)
        Writes the contents of a group of files to their respective output streams.
        Parameters:
        conn - an Ftpconnector instance.
        targets - a Map of paths to their respective OutputStream.
        Returns:
        An Map of paths to a Boolean indicating if the respective file was found and written to their respective OutputStream.
